name: M key fragment
message: Upon awakening in the room you feel a hard lump in your once soft pillow. Reaching inside you find a fragment of a key with an M engraved in it

name: A key fragment
message: As you lower the tankard you see an object in the bottom. Upon emptying the tankard you find a key fragment with an A engraved in it

name: G key fragment
message: As you speak the words `a bird` the flames roar even higher and the fragment of a key is spit on to the hearth, a glowing G is engraved on it

name: I key fragment
message: Reaching into the pocket of the pool table you pull out a key fragment with an I engraved into it

name: C key fragment
message: As the safe cracks open you find a key fragment with a C engraved onto it

name: Safe Key
message: Pulling a key from under a bench you see a small piece of parchment attached, on it a message reads 'Discover treasures in the strongbox with this elusive key'
